text: Yuriy Vasilevich Shatunov, commonly known as Yuri (Russian:Юрий Васильевич Шатунов) (6 September 1973 - 23 June 2022) was a Russian singer. He was best known for being the former frontman of the Russian 1980s band Laskoviy Mai (Ласковый май). He was born in Kumertau, Bashkir ASSR.Официальная биография Shatunov died on 23 June 2022 at a hospital in Domodedovo, Russia from a heart attack, aged 48.Russian singer Yuri Shatunov from Soviet boyband Laskovyi Mai dies aged 48 ==References== ==Other websites== * Shatunov.com, official site Category:1973 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Russian singers Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:People from Bashkortostan
title: Yuri Shatunov
